strings: You dream of a river of snakes. The snakes fly into the air, away from you.
You have dreams of power, flowing out from books, and flying into your head.
You have a nightmare about a tower burning endlessly through the night while laughter rings out.
In your dreams, you see an orc stomping on two small rabbits.
You dream about a man stronger than you staring you from the other side of a circular table. His grin terrifies you.
You have dreams of home, of your deceased father tanning hides to sell at his store.
In your dreams, you remember how your benevolent mother would allow poor farmers to use the watermill for free.
